backend/main.mo: Empty actor definition with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata linking features to frontend files and components for weather advice and banner rendering.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode theming.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component managing location flow and rendering search, empty state, or weather panel.
frontend/src/components/AdviceBanner.tsx: Displays contextual weather advice with icons, color styling, and wrapped title/message text.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with header, footer, and themed background.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Landing screen with hero image and button to start a location search.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing credits and data source attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with the app logo, title, and tagline.
frontend/src/components/LocationSearch.t: Search form and results list for selecting a place via geocoding API.
frontend/src/components/WeatherPanel.tsx: Shows current weather details, errors/loading states, and the generated advice banner.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentWeather.ts: Fetches current weather data for given coordinates using React Query with caching and retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, managing login, logout, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlaceSearch.ts: Runs a geocoding search query for places, disabled by default until manually triggered.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module exporting nothing, noting that queries are defined in feature hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/weatherAdvice.ts: Generates weather advice messages based on conditions like rain, snow, temperature, and wind.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/services/geocoding.ts: Searches locations via Nominatim and normalizes results into Place objects.
frontend/src/services/weatherApi.ts: Fetches current weather from Open-Meteo and maps weather codes to descriptive conditions.
frontend/src/types/weather.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for Place, WeatherData, and WeatherAdvice.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
